skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bethany church
des: Listen to the latest sermons from Bethany. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. When listening to podcasts you can ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next". For more, see our website bethanyum.org and have a blessed week
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
